comment: /**  * Starts or restarts the stop watch  */
code: /**  * Starts or restarts the stop watch  */ public void restart() {     start = System.currentTimeMillis(). }

comment: /**  * Returns the time taken in millis.  *  * @return time in millis, or <tt>0</tt> if not started yet.  */
code: /**  * Returns the time taken in millis.  *  * @return time in millis, or <tt>0</tt> if not started yet.  */ public long taken() {     if (start > 0) {         return System.currentTimeMillis() - start.     } else {         return 0.     } }
